input.activity_signal: Company has active website (rgtn.com) found via search showing current operations as "Your Trusted Telecom Partner". FCC granted their numbering authorization in 2024 (Public Notice DA-24-739A1). DOJ review of their application was ongoing as of January 2024, indicating recent regulatory activity. USPTO trademark registration filed November 2023 for telecom services.
input.product_summary: RGTN USA provides interconnected VoIP services and wholesale voice/SMS services, specializing in telecom infrastructure and connectivity solutions for other service providers.
